education.title: Understanding EMDR Therapy
education.whatDesc: Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing is a scientifically-proven therapy for processing traumatic memories and reducing emotional distress.
education.howDesc: EMDR uses bilateral stimulation (eye movements, sounds, or touch) to help your brain reprocess difficult memories and reduce their emotional impact.
education.whoDesc: People dealing with PTSD, anxiety, phobias, traumatic memories, or chronic stress. EMDR is recognized by WHO and major health organizations.
